attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone who knows how to ride a bicycle, can ride it on any British road, I am asking for all bicycles to carry a fixed licence number plate, and a register of riders.
All cycles on the road should be fit and proper, with  lights, reflectors, bell, and brakes and good tires.
All riders should pass a safety test before being issued with a licence plate, and must have a Hi Viz safety vest and helment
all riders should have insurance
